name: ts-for-gir-soup-3-websocket-example
description: Simple Gjs Soup 3 example app to demonstrate how you can use WebSockets

scripts.build: yarn run build:types && yarn run build:client
scripts.start: yarn run build && yarn run start:client
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:types && yarn run validate:app

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
